deploy(address,address,address).details: Deploys a pool with the given parameters by transiently setting the parameters in cache.

params.token0: The first token of the pool by address sort order
params.token1: The second token of the pool by address sort order

getDeployParameters().details: Called by the pool constructor to fetch the parameters of the pool

returns._token0: The first token of the pool by address sort order
returns._token1: The second token of the pool by address sort order

cache0.details: two storage slots for dense cache packing

getDeployParameters().notice: Get the parameters to be used in constructing the pool, set transiently during pool creation.

userdoc.notice: Is used by AlgebraFactory to deploy pools
